flawed_nl_solution:
The last 3 students had an average completion time of 35 seconds so the sum of their completion times was 3*35 = <<3*35=105>>105 seconds
All 4 students (now including the student who came first) had an average completion time of 30 seconds, meaning the sum of their completion times is 4*30 = <<4*30=120>>120 seconds
The student who came first spent 120-105 = <<120-105=51>>51 seconds in the race
#### 51

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 15, not 51. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
